sourcesContent:
pairing-list works!

  • {{pairing}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PairingServiceService } from 'src/app/food-wine-pairing/pairing-service.service'; import { IFoodWinePair } from 'src/app/Interfaces/FoodWinePair'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pairing-list', templateUrl: './pairing-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pairing-list.component.css'] }) export class PairingListComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private repositoryService: PairingServiceService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getWines(); } FoodWinePair: any pairedWines: string[] = [] getWines(){ this.repositoryService.getWinePairing().subscribe( (response) => { console.log(JSON.stringify(response)) this.FoodWinePair = response; this.pairedWines = response.pairedWines }); } }
